def_cn: (大学、银行、教会等)(大型)机构的;具有机构特征的
def_en: Institutional means relating to a large organization, for example a university, bank, or church.
Institutional means relating to a building where people are looked after or held.

def_cn: 习俗化了的;制度化了的
def_en: An institutional value or quality is considered an important and typical feature of a particular society or group, usually because it has existed for a long time.
If someone accuses an organization of institutional racism or sexism, they mean that the organization is deeply racist or sexist and has been so for a long time.
